name: attr
parameters: byval row as ubyte, byval col as ubyte
doc:
function ATTR

Parameters:
    row: screen row
    col: screen column

Returns:
    a byte value containing the screen attribute color value

name: setattr
parameters: byval row as ubyte, byval col as ubyte, byval value as ubyte
doc:
sub SETATTR

Parameters:
    row: screen row
    col: screen column
    color: 8bit color attribute

Action: Sets the attribute of screen(row, column) to the given
        color attribute value.

name: attraddr
parameters: byval row as ubyte, byval col as ubyte
doc:
function fastcall ATTRADDR

Parameters:
    row: screen row
    col: screen column

Action: Gets the attribute address of screen(row, column)
